@graph.caption: Beef Stroganoff in a rustic white bowl over noodles

@graph.name: Beef Stroganoff | RecipeTin Eats
@graph.description: This retro classic is making a comeback! This 30 minute Beef Stroganoff has juicy beef (no dry chewy beef here!) smothered in a creamy mushroom gravy served over pasta or noodles.

@graph.name: Nagi
@graph.description: I believe you can make great food with everyday ingredients even if you’re short on time and cost conscious. You just need to cook clever and get creative!

@graph.name: Beef Stroganoff
@graph.description: RECIPE VIDEO ABOVE. Juicy strips of beef smothered in a sour cream mushroom gravy - a quick dinner everyone will love! KEY STEPS: Sear beef super quickly for maximum juiciness and use a large skillet (for quick sear + fast sauce reduction). Stroganoff calls for good beef but if you only have a budget cut, use this easy Chinese method to tenderise the beef (it's called "velveting"). It's life changing - and perfect for Stroganoff.
recipeIngredient: 600 g / 1.2 lb   scotch fillet steak / boneless rib eye ((Note 1))
300 g / 10 oz   mushrooms (, sliced (not too thin))
2 cups / 500 ml   beef broth (, preferably salt reduced)
250 - 300 g / 8 - 10 oz   pasta or egg noodles of choice ((Note 3))

recipeInstructions.text: Use your fist (or rolling pin or mallet) to flatten the steaks to about 3/4cm / 1/3" thick. Slice into 5mm / 1/5" strips (cut long ones in half), discarding excess fat.
recipeInstructions.name: Use your fist (or rolling pin or mallet) to flatten the steaks to about 3/4cm / 1/3" thick. Slice into 5mm / 1/5" strips (cut long ones in half), discarding excess fat.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with a pinch of salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle with a pinch of salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large skillet over high heat. Scatter half the beef in the skillet, QUICKLY spread it with tongs. Leave untouched for 30 seconds until browned. Turn beef quickly (as best you can!). Leave untouched for 30 seconds to brown. Immediately remove onto a plate. Don't worry about pink bits and that it will be raw inside.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large skillet over high heat. Scatter half the beef in the skillet, QUICKLY spread it with tongs. Leave untouched for 30 seconds until browned. Turn beef quickly (as best you can!). Leave untouched for 30 seconds to brown. Immediately remove onto a plate. Don't worry about pink bits and that it will be raw inside.

recipeInstructions.text: Add remaining 1 tbsp oil and repeat with remaining beef.
recipeInstructions.name: Add remaining 1 tbsp oil and repeat with remaining beef.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn heat down to medium high. Add butter, melt. Then add onions, cook for 1 minute, then add mushrooms.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn heat down to medium high. Add butter, melt. Then add onions, cook for 1 minute, then add mushrooms.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook mushrooms until golden. Scrape bottom of fry pan to get all the golden bits off (this is flavour!).
recipeInstructions.name: Cook mushrooms until golden. Scrape bottom of fry pan to get all the golden bits off (this is flavour!).

recipeInstructions.text: Add flour, cook, stirring, for 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add flour, cook, stirring, for 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add half the broth while stirring. Once incorporated, add remaining broth.
recipeInstructions.name: Add half the broth while stirring. Once incorporated, add remaining broth.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir, then add sour cream and mustard. Stir until incorporated (don't worry if it looks split, sour cream will "melt" as it heats).
recipeInstructions.name: Stir, then add sour cream and mustard. Stir until incorporated (don't worry if it looks split, sour cream will "melt" as it heats).

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to simmer ,then reduce heat to medium low. Once it thickens to the consistency of pouring cream (3 - 5 minutes), adjust salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to simmer ,then reduce heat to medium low. Once it thickens to the consistency of pouring cream (3 - 5 minutes), adjust salt and pepper to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Add beef back in (including plate juices). Simmer for 1 minute, then remove from stove immediately. (Note 4)
recipeInstructions.name: Add beef back in (including plate juices). Simmer for 1 minute, then remove from stove immediately. (Note 4)

recipeInstructions.text: Serve over pasta or egg noodles, sprinkled with chives if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve over pasta or egg noodles, sprinkled with chives if desired.
